channel.title: Help with duel arena please!

item.title: Help with duel arena please!
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

OK so i downloaded the deltascape with duel arena and i added to my server but it donâ€™t show the challange in duel. How can i fix, and yes i added this:

public boolean isInDuelArena(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordY >= 3260) && (coordY <= 3289) && (coordX <= 3384) && (coordX >= 3345)) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Challenge"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); return true; } else { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("null"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); return true; } }

Read full topic
